name: Game of Beans
description:
You, Sean Bean, a retired actor and hobbyist bean farmer, have enraged the locals by starring in too few movies featuring your own grisly death.

You must protect your farm with the only defence you have - your body! Throw yourself in front of the flaming arrows to prevent them from setting your farm ablaze! In the unlikely event that your farm catches fire, you must hurl your body onto the flames to smother them! Careful that Sean doesn’t get too crispy himself though! Toss Beany into the well to cool him down and reduce his crispyness.

Any likeness to real-life actor Sean Bean is purely coincidental…

Controls:

Click and hold the mouse to move (not) Sean Bean’s body. 

Created by OuterCube:

  • Art - Aidan Parr
  • Audio - Marcus Galic
  • Code - Adam Judd
  • Code - Noah de Win
